mainboard.name: Aether Tradewinds
mainboard.oracle_text: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

mainboard.name: Reprieve
mainboard.oracle_text:
Return target spell to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Daze
mainboard.oracle_text:
You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

mainboard.name: Condescend
mainboard.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mainboard.name: Memory Lapse
mainboard.oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

mainboard.name: Otawara, Soaring City
mainboard.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {U}.
Channel — {3}{U}, Discard Otawara, Soaring City: Return target artifact, creature, enchantment, or planeswalker to its owner's hand. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature you control.

mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures.

Flash

mainboard.name: Exclusion Mage
mainboard.oracle_text: When Exclusion Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

mainboard.name: Flooded Strand
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Flying

Flying

mainboard.name: Pteramander
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
{7}{U}: Adapt 4. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

mainboard.name: Snapcaster Mage
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

mainboard.name: Wrath of God
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying

mainboard.name: Touch the Spirit Realm
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Touch the Spirit Realm enters the battlefield, exile up to one target artifact or creature until Touch the Spirit Realm leaves the battlefield.
Channel — {1}{W}, Discard Touch the Spirit Realm: Exile target artifact or creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

mainboard.name: Oblivion Ring
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainboard.name: Glass Casket
mainboard.oracle_text: When Glass Casket enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value 3 or less until Glass Casket leaves the battlefield.

mainboard.name: Meticulous Archive
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
Meticulous Archive enters the battlefield tapped.
When Meticulous Archive enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

mainboard.name: Unsummon
mainboard.oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

mainboard.name: Gomazoa
mainboard.oracle_text:
Defender, flying
{T}: Put Gomazoa and each creature it's blocking on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle.

mainboard.name: Into the Roil
mainboard.oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)

mainboard.name: Repeal
mainboard.oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Fact or Fiction
mainboard.oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

mainboard.name: Journey to Nowhere
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature.
When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

sideboard.name: Mark of Mutiny
sideboard.oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

sideboard.name: Magma Jet
sideboard.oracle_text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.

({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)

sideboard.name: Ajani Goldmane
sideboard.oracle_text:
+1: You gain 2 life.
−1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
−6: Create a white Avatar creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

sideboard.name: Farsight Ritual
sideboard.oracle_text:
Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.)
Look at the top four cards of your library. If this spell was bargained, look at the top eight cards of your library instead. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

sideboard.name: Quicken
sideboard.oracle_text:
The next sorcery spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. (It can be cast any time you could cast an instant.)
Draw a card.

sideboard.name: River Kelpie
sideboard.oracle_text:
Whenever River Kelpie or another permanent enters the battlefield from a graveyard, draw a card.
Whenever a player casts a spell from a graveyard, draw a card.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

sideboard.name: Moon-Circuit Hacker
sideboard.oracle_text:
Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)

sideboard.name: Winds of Rebuke
sideboard.oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Each player mills two cards.

sideboard.name: Tameshi, Reality Architect
sideboard.oracle_text:
Whenever one or more noncreature permanents are returned to hand, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
{X}{W}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Return target artifact or enchantment card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
